dcterms:creator: M. Bütler
F. Teppa
dcterms:description: The dataset provides results from Swiss pension funds regarding the choice between an annuity and a lump sum.
dcterms:title: The Choice Between an Annuity and a Lump Sum: Results from Swiss Pension Funds

dcterms:creator: A. Finkelstein
J. Poterba
dcterms:description: This dataset provides evidence from the U.K. annuity market regarding adverse selection in insurance markets.
dcterms:title: Adverse selection in insurance markets: Policyholder evidence from the U.K. annuity market

dcterms:creator: J.R. Brown
J.R. Kling
S. Mullainathan
M.V. Wrobel
dcterms:description: This dataset explores the reasons behind the under-annuitization puzzle, focusing on framing effects in decision-making.
dcterms:title: Why don’t people insure late-life consumption? a framing explanation of the under-annuitization puzzle

dcterms:creator: O. Mitchell
J. Poterba
M. Warshawsky
J. Brown
dcterms:description: This dataset provides new evidence on the money’s worth of individual annuities, analyzing their value to consumers.
dcterms:title: New evidence on the money’s worth of individual annuities

dcterms:creator: W.J. Horneff
R.H. Maurer
O.S. Mitchell
M.Z. Stamos
dcterms:description: This dataset examines asset allocation and location over the life cycle with investment-linked survival-contingent payouts.
dcterms:title: Asset allocation and location over the life cycle with investment-linked survival-contingent payouts
